item.title: By: David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description:
Hmm, I notice that in 2015 you wrote (http://www.neverendingbooks.org/g-recovery-2-grothendieck)
"1. Géométrie élémentaire schématique. (August 1992) This is about quadratic forms and seems to be really elementary. "
item.content:encoded:
Hmm, I notice that in 2015 you wrote (http://www.neverendingbooks.org/g-recovery-2-grothendieck)

“1. Géométrie élémentaire schématique. (August 1992) This is about quadratic forms and seems to be really elementary. “

item.title: By: T
item.dc:creator: T
item.description: Seulement consultable par les chercheurs?! Une honte!
item.content:encoded: Seulement consultable par les chercheurs?! Une honte!

item.title: By: David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description: I'm most interested in the 1992 document "Géométrie élémentaire schématique", which has a chance of having some interesting mathematical content.
item.content:encoded: I’m most interested in the 1992 document “Géométrie élémentaire schématique”, which has a chance of having some interesting mathematical content.
